description:
Microsoft Office PowerPoint is the best known graphics presentation package that offers everything you need to produce a professional-looking presentation - all designed for easy use.

Before you can work efficiently with Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2013, you first have to get to know the way the program is designed. Otherwise, you could lose valuable time by using the basic but long trial & error method. SONIC's training videos explain and demonstrate how to work professionally with PowerPoint 2013.

Our instructor will explain all of the features and functionalities Microsoft PowerPoint 2013 offers in an easy to understand, step-by-step method. The videos have been designed for both first-time users with fundamental PowerPoint 2013 problems and advanced users with specific PowerPoint 2013 demands.

Quizzes are available at the end of each lesson to validate your knowledge.
title: Microsoft PowerPoint 2013: Beginner to Advanced
instructors: SONIC - High Quality Training for Over 20 Years
